description: Try our easy to follow Mini Chicken Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken pie,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Chicken,Sesame free,Baking,Peanut free
name: Mini Chicken Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken, carrot and potato in a medium saucepan. Pour over stock and bring to the boil over medium-high heat. Reduce to low heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add peas and cook for a further 5 minutes. Strain stock into a jug and transfer chicken mixture to a bowl.
Heat butter in the same pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes or until soft and golden. Stir in flour and cook for 2 minutes. Gradually stir in reserved stock until smooth.
Simmer over medium-low heat for 5 minutes or until thickened. Remove from heat and combine with chicken mixture.

HowToTip.tipText: Note: Loosely press pastry bases into muffin holes so they have a wavy edge.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Cut 24 x 9cm rounds from pastry and press into 2 x 12-hole medium muffin pans (see Note).
Spoon mixture into pastry shells. Cut 4cm fluted rounds for lids and place on filling. Bake pies for 25-30 minutes or until crisp and golden brown.
